name: Keep here 4ever
description:
Keep here 4ever

[game in progress]

2D platform video game based on the medieval age.  You hear the voice of your grandmother coming from a endless keep, so you decide to go inside and try to find her. You have to hurry cause the wolf is going too...

  • You have to climb to the top of the keep by changing between perspectives around the y-axis.
  • The levels will increase in difficulty by adding obstacles each level.  
  • Endless game.
  • Game made in 3 days for #ZenoJam.
    • Theme:  'It never ends'
Controls MoveA DJumpW  Credits

Game made by @SimpleandClean_ and @Raulserranodev.

Music by: @SimpleandClean_.
